## Summary

Describe the change and why it is needed.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Security hardening

## Validation

- [ ] `npm run typecheck`
- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm test`
- [ ] `npm run build`

## Safety checks

- [ ] No credentials or secrets added
- [ ] Mutation/admin guard behavior reviewed if affected
- [ ] HTTP auth behavior reviewed if transport/auth code changed

## Docs

- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] Operational docs updated (if needed)
- [ ] Release checklist updated (if needed)
